org.mitre.synthea.engine

Class HealthRecordEditors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.engine.HealthRecordEditors

  • public class HealthRecordEditors
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class for managing all of the implementations of HealthRecordEditor.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HealthRecordEditors getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of HealthRecordEditors.
        Returns:
        the one

      • registerEditor

        public void registerEditor(HealthRecordEditor editor)
        Add a HealthRecordEditor to be run during the simulation.
        Parameters:
        editor - The editor to add

      • executeAll

        public void executeAll(Person person,
                       HealthRecord record,
                       long time,
                       long step)
        Runs all of the registered implementations of HealthRecordEditor. Will first check to see if the editor should be run by invoking... shouldRun. If it should run, will call process on the editor.

        It's unlikely that this method should be called by anything outside of Generator.

        Parameters:
        person - The Person to run on, and the source of randomness
        record - The HealthRecord to potentially modify
        time - The current time in the simulation
        step - The time step for the simulation

      • resetEditors

        public void resetEditors()
        Remove all registered editors.
